hadiths.text: This hadith has been narrated through another chain of transmitters (and the words are):" A person from among the Ansar willed away the freedom of six slaves of his at the time of his death

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ أَعْتَقَ شِرْكًا لَهُ فِي عَبْدٍ
chapter.eng-name: One who frees his share in a slave
